The goal of this library is to operationalize the HorsePooDetector. Read more about this here

getting started

Prodigy

Here are some useful commands from the documentation

  • prodigy stats shows some statistics
  • prodigy help
  • prodigy stats --list-datasets
  • prodigy stats dataset_name -l shows dataset stats
  • prodigy drop dataset_name
